description: Father of Neon, and head of Nostrade Mafia family. The Nostrade Family was originally a minor provincial Mafia family (subordinates of Ritz family) of little importance, but by shrewdly using the fortune telling ability of his daughter Neon, Light Nostrade managed to greatly increase his position in the Mafia Community, to the point where even the Ten Dons seek his daughter`s advice.
name: Light Nostrade
